item.title: Basics to get started with Tensorflow
item.description: 1. What is Tensor Just a fancy word for an n-dimentional matrix Or an advanced array Holds only single type They are the standard way of representing data in tensorflow. 2. Tensor Data Types python type    Description tf.float32 32 bits floating point tf.float64 64 bits floating point tf.int8 8 bits signed integer tf.int16 16 bits signed integer tf.

item.title: Matrix Math and Numpy Refresher
item.description: image borrowed from UDACITY Data Dimentions We fist need to understand how we represent the data specifically the shape the data can have. Eg: we can have a number representing a person height or a list of numbers for height, weight, age etc. May be a display picture represented as grid having rows and columns of each individual pixels and each pixels having its color value for RED, BLUE, GREEN.

item.title: Core Programming Principles
item.description: #integer x = 2x 2 #float y = 2.5y 2.5 #string a = "hello" b = 'hello2'a b hello hello2 #logical / boolean q1 = Trueq True
